message: Hello Bob, I believe this product would be incredibly valuable to you, even more so than it is to me.  I'm willing to part with it for $1,150,000.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay $1,050,000 for the product.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm confident you won't find this product for a better price elsewhere. I'm willing to come down to $1,100,000. This is my final offer.
Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am still interested in purchasing the product, and I would like to propose a price of $1,075,000.
